General.Name: Hangzhou Honghua Digital Technology Stock Company LTD
General.Description: Hangzhou Honghua Digital Technology Stock Company LTD. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of digital ink-jet printing equipment. It offers digital direct-injection printing machines, digital inkjet Transfer printing machines, and ultra-high-speed industrial jet printers, as well as inks used in the textile industry, inkjet printing consumables, software, etc. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
